name: ultra-thin wax strips
ingredients: Nil
description: What are 1000 Hour Ultra-thin Wax Strips? 1000 Hour™ introduces a revolutionary line of Ultra-thin Wax Strips™ that are simple, fast, economical & convenient. Since the wax strips are super-thin, they are a lot less painful than other strip waxes and what’s even more appealing is that they leave no residual wax on the skin, therefore no clean-up lotions necessary. That’s why stripping off never felt so good. 1000 Hour™ Ultra-thin Wax Strips™ are the first of their kind to cater for different hair types: Fine to Medium Hair; and Medium to Coarse Hair. Enriched with Aloe Vera & Vitamin E to nourish the skin, is fragrance free and are hygienic single-use wax strips. 1000 Hour™ Ultra-thin Wax Strips™ come in three sizes - large, ideal for arms, legs & body; medium, ideal for underarms, bikini & body; small, ideal for face, lip, chin & touch-ups. There is no wastage - the wax strips are versatile, they can be used as a complete strip or cut down for delicate or specific areas. The innovative slim-line pack is perfect for storage & travel. 1000 Hour™ Ultra-thin Wax Strips™ are available for both Women and Men. Why 1000 Hour? Because waxing removes hair by the root, you're left with a silky-smooth feeling that can last up to 4-6 weeks*. 1000 Hour™ Ultra-thin Wax Strips™ are easy to use and far more comfortable than you might imagine. Say goodbye to prickly stubble and sticky residue will become a thing of the past! INSTRUCTIONS: 1) Dry and clean skin thoroughly. 2) To reduce stickiness, dust the skin lightly with talcum powder. 3) Rub the wax strip (still on paper) between hands for 20 seconds to prepare wax. 4) Place wax strip in direction of hair growth. 5) Stroke firmly 3-4 times in the direction of hair growth. 6) PULL OFF IMMEDIATELY, no waiting time. Hold skin taut with one hand and firmly pull against direction of hair growth.
where_to_buy: Guardian, Watsons, John Little & other leading Pharmacies

name: avalon american ginseng slice with honey
ingredients: Nil
description: AVALON ® American Ginseng Slice, replenish your energy! Why do we need American Ginseng? Our hectic lifestyle results in us being highly stressed, always over-exerting ourselves and suffering from a lack of sleep. We often feel tired, lack of strength and sleepy throughout the day. Other common symptoms include irritable and hepato-pyrexia. In addition, hot weather results in dryness in the mouth, profuse sweating, sleeplessness, lack of energy, etc. The above symptoms are regarded as “ Qi and Yin deficiencies” in TCM. Such deficiencies over a long period will deplete our Qi (Energy) and may result in illnesses.   Perpetual state of fatigue disrupts our metabolism and body functions. At this stage, our internal system will not recover fully by simply one or two resting. Appropriate nourishing is necessary to reverse harms caused to our body, effectively cure “fatigue”, replenish energy and return our body to its equilibrium. Ginseng, a good Adaptogen American ginseng, or Panax quinquefolius, originated from the US and Canada , is a highly valuable healthcare supplement and has been used clinically for more than 300 years. Ginseng's genus name Panax is derived from the Greek pan (all) akos (cure), meaning cure-all. The transliteration of the word gin (man) seng (essence) is derived from the Chinese ideogram for "crystallization of the essence of the earth in the form of a man”.   TCM believes that American and Asian ginsengs replenish Qi, however American ginseng has a cooling property, whereas Asian ginseng may cause heatiness.   American ginseng is often used to replenish energy ( Qi ), relief stress, improve concentration, and heighten both physical and intellectual powers. In the West, American ginseng is regarded as an excellent adaptogen to help people to adapt to the environment, reinstate body equilibrium, restore energy and improve body's resistance to stress and illnesses. Native Americans use ginseng to enhance fertility and improve mental faculty, as well as treat respiratory illnesses, headache and fever.   Medical researches confirm that the cooling American ginseng not only replenishes energy (Qi), nourish Yin, improves alertness and memory, relieves fatigue and nourishes the lungs, it also promotes body fluid production, maintains youthful looks, restores equilibrium and strengthens immune system. With so many benefits, it is indeed a first class tonic.   When do we need American Ginseng? •  prior intense mental work •  before and after exercise •  traveling •  lack of strength •  learning, examinations, feeling tense •  chest tightness, asthma, cough •  dryness in the mouth, irritable and sleeplessness •  general weakness, lack of energy •  post surgery, post delivery, and recovering from an illness   Rejuvenate your life AVALON ® American Ginseng Slice with Honey is a convenient and nourishing product launched by Hi-Beau International Pte Ltd. This product uses premium grade American ginseng and linden honey, thereby is extremely palatable. It helps boost stamina and vigor without heating and stimulating properties. For hygiene, portability and easy consumption, AVALON ® American Ginseng Slice with Honey is vacuum-packed in sachets. As each sachet contains 5g of honey Ginseng, dosage is well controlled. The nutritive benefits of Essence of Ginseng are optimized by immediate absorption through the capillaries in the mouth during the chewing process.   The benefits of AVALON ® American Ginseng Slice with Honey •  Enhances immunity •  Replenish energy •  Relief fatigue •  Nourishes lungs to safeguard against cough •  Prevents dryness of mouth and constant thirst •  Promotes beauty and maintain youthful looks •  Improve concentration and memory   Recommended Dosage For general healthcare, consume a sachet daily, by chewing.   Feeling fatigue, before and during cold, post operation, post delivery and recovering from illness, consume 2 packs daily, by chewing.   Tips on taking ginseng Tip # 1 : Do not over-consume Ginseng at any one time. Over dosage can result in side effects such as nose-bleeding, nervousness, skin eruptions, stomach upset. Though ginseng is good for health, please do not over eat! AVALON® American Ginseng Slice with Honey is vacuum packed in 5g of honey ginseng. Take one sachet each time to maintain consistency of dosage and avoid over-dosage. Tip #2 : Do not consume ginseng with an empty stomach. According to WHO Monograph, Ginseng may lower down blood glucose level. Though ginseng is highly nutritional, we still need to consume it at the right time. AVALON® American Ginseng Slice with Honey is ready for consumption at your convenience. However avoid consuming with an empty stomach even for healthy people. Tip # 3 : Not many people bother to spend time and energy to prepare ginseng tonic soup regularly. No matter how nutritious a tonic product is, regular consumption is necessary to enjoy its maximum benefits. Ginseng is an excellent tonic, but the preparation is extremely time-consuming! AVALON® American Ginseng Slice with Honey is vacuum packed, hygienic and ready-to-eat. All you need is just a sachet per day. Tip #4 : Asian ginseng (Chinese and Korean ginseng) is not suitable for everyone. It can be too heaty for some people. AVALON® American Ginseng Slice with Honey is made from premium American Ginseng. It is nourishing, palatable and not heaty. Just one sachet per day, it re-energizes you!
product_name: avalon american ginseng slice with honey

ingredients: Nil
description:
Made with 100% natural pulp fabric and tailored with a specialised 3D cutting to fit to the contours of your face like a second skin! Soaked in rich essence formulated with skin-
friendly natural extracts to effectively moisturise.

 

Formulated with Marine Collagen and enhanced with

  • Dipotassium Glycyrrhizinate - Prevents acne and outbreaks
  • Vitamin E & Collagen - For firmer, smoother skin
  • Hamamelis Extract - Tightens skin and pores

 

How to use:
Use on cleansed skin. Apply the mask, fitting it to the contours of your face. Leave the mask on for about 15 minutes before removing it. Gently massage your face until the remaining essence is absorbed by your skin. Finish with your usual moisturiser/cream.

 

Try it as a HOT MASK for enhanced relaxing and skin conditioning effects!
While in the bathtub, heat the mask by soaking the sealed packet in your bath water (about 40°C) for about 5 minutes. Apply the hot mask to your face for about 5 minutes while you soak and enjoy your bath. Finish with your usual moisturiser/cream (no need to apply toner).

About Bioderma:

description: New ingredient for more powerful anti-ageing Adenosine Tri-phosphate (ATP) is a molecule which stores the energy that the body needs for a wide variety of functions. The breakdown of ATP releases energy which is then used as fuel for all our bodily functions, from DNA replication and skin regeneration to muscle contraction and collagen synthesis. Bio-essence V Face Series, enriched with ATP and combination of exclusive ingredients Bio Energy Fluid and Bio Mineral Essence, have double the effects to provide and communicate energy to skin cells. ATP improves micro-circulation, effectively renewing and repairing skin, hence restores suppleness, radiance, firmness and a youthful V shape to your skin. Removing dead skin is the first step to beautiful, healthy and younger looking skin. The accumulation of dead skin leads to multiple skin care problems; dead skin can clog pores, causing enlarged pores, blackheads and whiteheads. It also prevents the skin from absorbing moisture leading to dull, rough and oily skin. Bio-essence Deep Exfoliating Gel with ATP helps to slough off dead skin cells immediately to reveal a new layer of fairer, smoother and much cleaner looking skin. Powered with the efficacies of ATP (Adenosine Triphosphate) and Bio Energy ingredients, it improves skin metabolism for firmer skin while lightening pigmentation at the same time. * Thoroughly and effectively removes dead skin cells * Gently and painlessly removes blackheads and lightens pimples * No need for squeezing or pore strips to remove blackheads, whiteheads and pimples * Helps to control shine, leaving skin refined and revitalised * Removes layers of dead skin cells while providing essential nutrients to skin

Feed Your Skin with Bird’s Nest Achieve Instant Skin’s Smoothness & Fairness

suppler and fairer after use.
Bird’s Nest Nutri-Collagen & Whitening Advancer contains concentrated Bird’s Nest Essence to supply nutrients to the skin. More than a toner, the advancer combines other active ingredients Amino Acid Skin Whitening Complex, Hyaluronic Acid and Ginseng to effectively nourish the skin and promote complete absorption of subsequent skincare products for suppler and fairer complexion.

What is an advancer and how does it work?
Bird’s Nest Nutri-Collagen & Whitening Advancer promotes absorption of skincare products and also advances skin condition and performance to maximize the benefits of the ingredients absorbed.

The 3-step approach
1. The advancer gently softens the cornified layer on the skin’s surface to enhance the skin’s ability to absorb skincare products.
2. Bio Energy Fluid promotes blood and oxygen micro-circulation, hence improving metabolism to allow subsequent skincare products to be more quickly absorbed and fully “digested” by the skin to maximize product efficacies.
3. Extra concentrated Bird’s Nest Nutri-Collagen to supply nutrients and plumps up the skin to keep it supple and smooth while Amino Acid Skin Whitening Complex restores skin luminosity to reveal a fair and translucent complexion. It also contains Hyaluronic Acid to lock in moisture and hydrates the skin.

• Promotes quick and complete absorption of subsequent skincare products
• Concentrated Bird’s Nest Essence nourishes and hydrates the skin, leaving it soft and delicate
• Amino Acid Skin Whitening Complex effectively reduces dull and yellowish skin tone for a fair and translucent complexion from within
• Relieves skin dryness and prevents the formation of fine lines for softer and smoother skin

name: bio-spring water
ingredients: Aqua, Bio-spring Water, Mineral Content(Potassium, Sodium, Calcium, Magnesium, Aluminium), Trace Mineral Content(Copper, Zinc, Lithium, Molybdenium, Iron)
suitable_for: All Skin Types, excellent for sensitive skin
description:
20 EXCELLENT EFFICACIES 
20 Marvelous Results for Hair, Face & Body 
Uniquely low in mineral content yet rich in trace minerals to ensure 2X cooling, soothing, softening, moisturizing and anti-irritating effects. 
 
Ideal for all skin types, Bio-essence Bio-Spring Water is the coolest spring water that yields the best soothing, anti-irritation and calming effects on skin. Adapting unique Bio-technology to combine Spring Water and Bio-Energy Fluid, Bio- Spring Water contains trace mineral to create energy to stimulate blood and oxygen circulation.
 
High Trace Minerals for Healthy Skin
Skin cells suffer from fatigue and skin dullness from environmental aggressions and mineral deficiencies. Trace minerals are essential minerals required by human health. It accelerates skin healing process and gives the skin sufficient hydration to improve on skin roughness. Bio-essence Bio-spring Water contains high trace minerals which are the perfect, natural treatment to obtain optimum skin care health. While minerals are vital in modern skin care, higher mineral content releases more energy and heat which will be drying to the skin.

Unique Points with multi-efficacies for face, body and hair
Having unique composition, Bio-Spring water is specially low in mineral content and sodium chloride content yet rich in trace minerals, ensuring 2X effect for cooling and soothing sensitive and irritated skin.

Low in mineral content creates lesser energy and heat which is ideal for cooling and soothing sensitive and irritable skin. Low in Sodium Chloride of 2.432mg/l absorbs least skin moisture, ensures the best moisturizing effects. High Sodium Chloride content dehydrates skin as it absorbs moisture from the skin. Optimal pH value of 6.45 is closest to skin’s natural pH value, is mild and non-irritating.

Directions of use:

name: aqua droplet sleeping beauty mask
ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Betaine, Methylpropanediol, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hyaluronic Acid, Vaccinium macrocarpon(Cranberry) Seed Oil, Fragrance, Sodium Oxide, Calcium Oxide, Magnesium Oxide, Methylisothiazolinone
suitable_for: All Skin Types, excellent for daily use
description:
Bio-essence Aqua Droplet Sleeping Beauty Mask is made with our unique Bio Aqua Crystal Technology. This technology forms a protective shield over the hydrating ingredients to prevent moisture loss before application. Upon application, this shield breaks away and big aqua droplets are formed. This ensures our skin gets hydrated with the freshest and optimal amount of the hydrating actives. The big aqua droplets are made up superior hydrating ingredients of small molecular size which allows moisture and nutrients to be easily delivered to the deep layers of skin, while the protective emollient film remains on skin to lock in moisture for non-stop hydration.


Wake Up To Supple & Firm Skin

This unique formulation is enriched with 2 types of Hyaluronic acid (Power Nano Hyaluronic Acid & Hyaluronic Acid), Cranberry Extract & Bio Energy Fluid, not only provides long lasting hydration but also protects skin from environmental factors. Bio-essence Aqua Droplet Sleeping Beauty Mask replenishes moisture, nourishes and repairs your skin non-stop while you sleep. Upon application, hydrating ingredients magically transform into big aqua droplets which are rapidly absorbed to constantly replenish and lock in moisture. This lightweight formula wraps the skin with a comfortable hydrating protective layer without any greasy and sticky feel. Say goodbye to dull, tired skin for a smooth, radiant and supple skin the next morning.

 

Product Efficacies:

  • Enriched with 2 types of Hyaluronic Acid (Power Nano Hyaluronic Acid & Hyaluronic Acid) to replenish and lock-in moisture, providing skin with non- stop hydration
  • With Cranberry Extracts to moisturize skin, for a radiant smooth complexion
  • Rapidly absorbs into skin, ensuring optimal nutrients being absorbed without any moisture lost and leaves no sticky feeling on skin
  • Delivers moisture intensively all night to hydrate and repair skin during sleep
  • Reveals a revitalized, supple and smooth skin the next morning
     

Combat 4 common skin problems

  • Brightens Dull & Tired Skin
  • Regulates Oil & Moisture Level
  • Moisturizes Dry & Rough Skin
  • Refines Enlarged Pores
     

Directions:
Step 1: Massage gently till aqua droplets form.
Step 2: Gently pat till fully absorbed into skin.
Step 3: Apply a thin layer over skin as a daily moisturiser. For more intensive treatment, apply a thicker layer to replenish skin's moisture throughout the night as a sleeping mask

How to use:

Clean surface with isopropyl rubbing alcohol. Press fasteners together till they click. Remove 1 liner position one set of strips on back of the frame, press firmly. Repeat. Remove remaining liners. Position frame on wall and press each set firmly for 30 seconds. Grab frame at bottom and peel off surface. Do not pull straight towards you to remove. Firmly press all 3 areas of each strip for 30 seconds each. Wait 1 hour to mount frame. Press fasteners firmly together till they click. If item is not level simply reposition.

name: all shiny white toothpaste - enamel white
ingredients: Water, Sorbitol, Hydrated silica, Glycerin, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Flavor, PEG-12, Carrageenan, Tetrasodium pyrophosphate, Sodium floride, Sodium saccharin, Cellulose gum, Titanium dioxide (CI 77891), CI (74160)
suitable_for: Members seeking for whiter, brighter teeth
description:
Want to know the secret behind a confident and beautiful smile? Secret lies in Darlie’s All Shiny White Toothpaste! Singapore No.1 Whitening Toothpaste to bring you the smile that you have always desire!

While most of us would take great care of our faces and bodies, treating ourselves to regular facials and massages, how many of us actually make conscious effort to take care of our teeth? Other than having shiny white teeth, good oral hygiene may also help to prevent or delay tooth erosion.


Tooth erosion affects the entire surface of the tooth. In time, tooth erosion can cause thinned enamel, and eventually can expose the softer dentine underneath the enamel. The enamel is a tissue covering the surface of the tooth crown and is the hardest, most highly mineralized substance in the human body. Functional enamel helps to absorb pressure of biting and chewing, protects the teeth inner structure and is essential for a beautiful smile. Dentine is sensitive so erosion can lead to your teeth being more sensitive to hot, cold or sweet foods and drinks.
Darlie, Singapore’s leading and trusted dental care brand, introduces an uniquely formulated toothpaste: Darlie All Shiny White Enamel Care Toothpaste to counter the above problems!


Its multi-benefit formula combines whitening power and enamel protection to strengthen teeth through re-mineralisation while 50 million of SWA (Speedy Whitening Agent) whitening molecules work to remove stubborn stains effectively. Be ready for healthy enamel and a dazzling whiter smile in just 14 days!
The first of its multiple benefits, Darlie All Shiny White Enamel helps strengthen tooth enamel. Overtime, the consumption of acidic food and drinks such as wine, soda drinks, citrus fruits, may cause damage to the teeth enamel. The enamel eventually loses its hardness and smoothness due to demineralisation resulting in the loss of tooth shininess and an uneven and course surface.


Fluoride has been proven in studies to strength enamel against acid erosion and re-mineralises enamel surface. The new Darlie All Shiny White Enamel Care toothpaste contains a unique enamel care formula that is enhanced with 45% more enamel strengthening ingredient*, Fluoride, which speed up the re-mineralisation of the enamel process as it restores surface smoothness of the teeth.


Like diamonds in the rough, our teeth need care for them to restore the shine and sparkle in your smile! Diamonds are a girl’s best friend and so are your set of precious teeth! Start your day right with Darlie All Shiny White Enamel Care and dazzle the world with a bright smile.


Darlie All Shiny White is Singapore’s No. 1 Whitening Toothpaste offering 5 variants – Lime Mint, Apple Mint, Enamel Care, All Shiny White (Regular) & Mineral Salt.

name: aquaporin active light moisturising cream
ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Glyceryl Glucoside, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Distarch Phosphate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, C12-12 Alkyl benzoate, Dimethicone, Myristyl Myristate, octyldodecanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Sodium polyacrylate, Alcohol Denat.,Methylisothiazolinone, Phenoxyethanol, Par
suitable_for: Sensitive skin Normal to Combination skin
description:
Optimal moisturisation even in deeper epidermal skin layers.
Because moisture is what skin needs most, the Eucerin Aquaporin Active range was especially developed to optimally distribute it in the skin.Its refreshing and fast-absorbing texture provides the skin with intense and long-lasting moisture.

 

Benefit:
The refreshing and fast-absorbing texture provides normal to combination skin with intense and long-lasting moisture - even in deeper epidermal skin layers. The skin instantly feels soft, supple & fresh and stays so over time. The innovation: Aquaporins are natural channels located in the cell membranes. By enabling water to flow into and out of the cells they help regulate the distribution of moisture in the epidermal skin layers. After years of research Eucerin has now developed AQUAporin ACTIVE, based on nature-identical Gluco-Glycerol that supports this natural network (in-vitro / ex-vivo). Moisture is optimally distributed even in deeper epidermal skin layers - long-lastingly. The result: Your skin is provided with intense moisture, even in deeper epidermal skin layers It instantly feels soft, supple & fresh and stays so over time Active Ingredients: With nature-identical Gluco-Glycerol: This ingredient activates the skin's natural moisture network by creating new aquaporins. Aquaporins regulate the moisture flow into and out of the cells, thus ensuring an optimal moisture distribution in the different epidermal layers.

 

Attributes:

  • Also suitable for sensitive skin.
  • Absorbs quickly. Non-comedogenic.
  • Excellent make-up base .
     

Recommended use:
Apply in the morning and/or evening to face, neck and décolleté by gently massaging into the skin after cleansing. Avoid contact with the eyes.

Afraid of eating Laksa? Don't worry! All you need is Stain Remover Wipes!

GENERAL DESCRIPTION

Freshening Stain Remover Wipes contains a foaming water soluble stain remover formulated
to remove instant stains which includes coffee, soda, beverages, milk, tea, sauces stain and even
mud from carpets without leaving ring marks or residues.


WHEN TO USE IT

  • For instant removal of accidental stains on cloths and carpets
  • For superficial stains on hard surfaces


METHOD OF APPLICATION

Gently wipe the towel on the stain until it is removed onto the sheet.

PRECAUTIONS

This is good for accidental stains only. Do not scrub the wipe heavily on the cloth as it may cause

name: glam & glamour tremella orient eye recovery mask
ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid, Witch Hazel
description:
What is Tremella?

Also known as sliver tree-ear or snow fungus, is a kind of translucent fungus, that is used as a skin tonic as dessert, food or soup. Since ancient times in Orient, it is known as a fungus of beauty for its ability to improve on skin texture and provide a youthful appearance.


Why Tremella?

Studies have shown that Tremella has excellent moisture retain ability. Tremella Polysaccharides, the active ingredient in Tremella, can hold about 500 times more water than its own weight.
It’s aqueous able to form a membrane with physical protection when used on skin.
It provides:

  •  intensive moisture to skin,
  •  improves skin texture & conditions
  •  Fight against various skin problems


Production Process of Mask sheet

The mask sheet is made from high quality Tremella through drying, grinding, decocting and extracting. Beauty essences are added in to give the perfect results.

Tremella Mask gives a good fit to skin where its fully absorbed essence will penetrate immediately to skin for the most optimal results.


Tremella Orient Eye Recovery Mask

Embracing the best cocktail with active ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid and Witch Hazel, skin is well-hydrated and fine lines appear less visible.

Benefits:

  • combat eye bags, dark circles and puffiness
  • reduces fine lines
  • brighten skin tone around eyes area
  • hydrates and nourishes


How to Use
On well-cleansed skin, place mask over eyes and press firm. Remove mask after 20 minutes. No need to rinse off.
where_to_buy: SASA cosmetics, Pink Beauty Cosmetics, Enamour Beauty, Tins & Bottles, St Thomas Cosmetics

name: smooth-365 intensive clarity smoothing peptide serum
ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Water, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Silica, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Saccharomyces/Xylinum Black Tea Ferment, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul's Wort) Extract, Morus Nigra (Mulberry) Root Extract, Citrus Grandi
description:
Smooth 365 Intensive Clarity + Smoothing peptide serum is a skin perfecting super serum and anti-aging treatment that offers instant improvement to the overall quality of skin’s texture, while firming and reducing the look of lines over time. This unique full-bodied serum combines the most sophisticated technologies and ingredients to target the key signs of aging – in one breakthrough product. The result is smoother, brighter and visibly less-lined skin instantly – and with continued use, well into the future.


What sets Smooth-365 apart is its multi-pronged approach that targets both texture and skin tone. What good is smoothing and softening if the skin is un-even and dull? Texture and tone go hand-in-hand. This magical complex comes at you from many angles to impart smoothness, provide textural improvement and offer skin benefits over time to give you the best of both worlds. The effective silicone-rich delivery system not only helps speed peptides onto skin to work their magic, but spreads easily and absorbs quickly, leaving the skin with a soft, velvety feel that is smooth to the touch.

 

Smooth 365 Intensive Clarity + Smoothing peptide serum improves and perfects skin in 3 different ways, 365 days a year. A clarity promoting cocktail of Yeast, Mulberry, Grape and Scutelleria extract evens out skin tone providing a more radiant, luminous complexion. The latest optical diffusers, including blue pearl, counter imperfections to immediately blur and smooth the look of lines. Power peptides such as Acetyl Hexapeptide and Palmitoyl Oilgopeptide fight even the most prominent wrinkles, kicking natural collagen production into gear to help firm skin and lift away the appearance of unwanted creases.

 

Smooth 365 Anaylsis:

  • Clinically proven to immediately improve skin clarity
  • Visibly smoothes skin instantly
  • Noticeably reduced appearance of lines with daily use Clinical Data Scientists conducted a series of stringent studies on Smooth 365 to test its effectiveness.
     

Studies showed…

  • Immediately: 71% measurable improvement in skin clarity
  • After 4 weeks: 47% measurable improvement in skin tone
  • After 8 weeks: 52% measurable improvement in the appearance of lines and wrinkle

 

How to use it :
For best results apply 1-2 pumps all over face and neck morning and night before moisturizing.

 

Country of origin:
USA

name: tri-aktiline instant deep wrinkle filler
ingredients: Water, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, HDI/PPG/Polycaprolactone Crosspolymer, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Ethylene/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Saccharomyces/Xylinum Black Tea Ferment, Dimethicone, C12-14 Pareth-12, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Algae Extract,
description:
Tri-Aktiline Instant Deep Wrinkle Filler is a targeted deep-wrinkle filler clinically proven to fill in the look of fine lines, lift, firm and hydrate instantly, while boosting skin’s natural collagen production over time. This innovative concentrate helps eliminate the appearance of wrinkles on contact, evening out and smoothing away the look of the deepest, most visible lines. Use it right where you need it most – on crow’s feet, laugh lines, anywhere facial expressions have left their mark.

 

The core of Tri-Aktiline is a high-tech cocktail of three ingredients that help firm and plump skin’s appearance over time.

  • Gatuline® Expression : extracted from the South American Acmella Oleraca plant, helps relax the look of facial tension and expression lines, like crow’s feet.
     
  • Kombuchka™ PH Extract, derived from sweet black tea, works to plump wrinkles to appear smoother on the surface.
     
  • Argireline®, or acetyl hexapeptide-3, helps prompt skin into its re-build mode, boosting natural collagen production for long-term visible wrinkle reduction.

This remarkably innovative formula provides immediate smoothing capabilities. Matte silicones instantly fill in creases on the skin’s surface, temporarily veiling them, while sodium hyaluronate (a humectant), avocado oil, cholesterol and shea butter hydrate the skin to further plump fine lines all over the face. A silky blend of optical diffusers (ultra-light spherical powders) help eliminate the appearance of wrinkles on contact

 

TRI-AKTILINE ANALYSIS:

Scientists from GoodSkin Labs conducted a series of stringent studies to test its effectiveness. Studies showed…
 

  • Immediately provides a visible reduction of facial lines
     
  • Clinically proven to help fill and relax the appearance of deep lines and wrinkles
     
  • Visibly reduces wrinkle depth and length Clinical Data At the end of eight weeks, researchers observed:
     
  • 45% reduction in the appearance of wrinkle depth and length
     
  • 58% improvement in lifting
     
  • 32% improvement in skin firmness Studies also showed a significant improvement in skin moisturization and barrier strength. Sensory Data
     
  • 83% of women demonstrated improvement in the appearance of lines after just 4 weeks
     
  • 68% noticed an immediate filling of wrinkles.

How to use it
After cleansing, lightly tap the lightweight cream directly into wrinkles, and let it set before applying other treatment products or makeup. For best results, use twice a day.


Country of origin
USA

description:
Tis the season to be Lolly... lol-ly lol-ly lo..oh LollyTalk!

Christmas Mix is now available at LollyTalk Plaza Singapura B2-20!!!

Candy handmade with awarding winning recipe, handcrafted with love and serve with passion!

 

Some trivia facts about LollyTalk's Candy Mix?….

 

1. LollyTalk are trained by two Aussie Masters Ross and Judy who won Gold Medal for their Fruit Rock Mix among all the rock candy makers in Australia (during the 2009 Royal Melbourne Fine Food Awards). Ross and Judy also won the title Grand Champion Rock Candy during that year too. LollyTalk is the only rock candy maker in Singapore making lolly using this award winning recipe from Ross and Judy.


2. The design of our fruit rock candy haven't really changes much since the founder of Aussie-style Rock Candy started them. LollyTalk are trained by Ross and Judy, who both were trained by the original founder of Aussie-style rock candy! Over at LollyTalk, we are proud to say we are the authentic third generation of lolly maker! Others might try to look like us, but they will never taste anything near to ours!

 

3. Our candy mix comes in different packaging with different sizes. Various mix are available from S$0.80 onwards in super mini pack.


4. All LollyTalk's lollies are made using Halal certified ingredients and all our facilities doesn't make any food that are non-halal since day one we open. We don't use animal parts or eggs, our lollies are all vegetarian friendly too. Our facilities doesn't make nuts products. Our product doesn't contain milk product, no alcohol, no liquor and no gelatine.


5. All the lolly are handmade with love and passion!

name: premium lungjing tea and apple flower tea
description: This tea is Superfine Grade 1 Lung Ching tea. Lung Ching is one of the most famous of of Chinese teas. Shifeng brand tea is producd by Zhejiang Tea Import and Export Co. Zhejiang is the Lung Ching producing capital of the world. It is an established fact that Green Tea is rich in polyphenols, an antioxident which has cancer-fighting qualities. Green tea is also known to help - diabetic patients - prevent heart disease - Its other health benefits include, - aids digestion - producing healthy skin - helps in weight control alongside a right diet regimeGreen tea is unfermented tea. (Oolong is 10-70% fermented and red tea, as it is referred to in China but known as black black to most of the world, is fully fermented.) Green tea being unfermented thus retains the most catechin polyphenols found in tea leaves. Polyphenols are anti-oxidents which terminate oxidation in the human body which produces cell-damaging free radicals. Lung Ching tea is best when it is fresh -- the tea being offered here is the spring 2008 crop. You can't get it fresher than that. You can see the quality of the leaves, before and after brewing, in the pix which has a 1-sen coin to give you perspective. Enjoy Lung Ching's full benefit now!

MYGENLIFE is about designing an effective solutions to the Asian Face, Body and Hair care. Finally, Medical graded products are made available on pharmacy shelves.

 

MYGEN LIFE Chief R&D developer, Professor P.BUGAULT has developed countless patented products in the Medical Aesthetics world for more 20 years. Face, Body and hair care products are researched and tested in France where He is based in.   ‘I am finally happy to announce using my medical aesthetics experience, I present to you the NEW & EXCITING offers for the Asian man and Woman, enjoy it!' - Prof. BUGUALT.

 

MYGEN LIFE BOARD member & Medical consultant, Dr Sabine Zenker is an internationally renowned dermatologist, Germany who specializes in Anti Aging techniques and formulas to obtain youthful looking skin. Based in Munich, Germany, Dr Zenker practices in clinics focusing on Aesthetic Dermatology in both Europe and the United States. As a regular contributor to several medical publication and journal, Dr Sabine has been invited to speak to doctors at major demagogical and aesthetic congresses globally.

 

Dr Zenker is a member of many national international medical professional associations including the German Dermatology Society (DDG), The American Academy of Dermatology (AAD), The European Academy of Dermatology and Venereology (EADV) and other American professional associations including ASCDAS, AAAACS & the Dermatologic / Aesthetic Surgery National League (DASIL). WHITENING  - Whitening Nectar drink helps to even out skin tone, lighten skin blemishes, pigmentation and promote lasting fairness from within. In just 28 days** , you will achieve a fairer radiant and glowy look. ** 

 

Main Ingredients: - Sakura Extract ( Patent ) can inhibit the activity of tyrosinase, which will cause melanin that darkens skin. Its anti-aging properties also enable your skin to remain younger and more radiant looking. - Pearl Powder is a widely used treatment of acne and skin purifier. It is also suitable for people with sensitive skin. - Glutathione is your body’s antioxidant and detoxifier. It helps stimulate your body’s immune system to slow down the aging process. - Camu Camu contains the highest natural concentration of immune-boosting Vitamin C and is high in antioxidants. It comparison to oranges, it has 30-50 times more Vitamin C. Vitamin C is also essential in the formation of healthy collagen.

There-in-one highly-effective sun-block mechanism , to obstruct UV rays comprehensively Fullerene, one of the ingredients awarded by Nobel Prize, to activate skin and delay photo-aging - Multiple Vitamin C derivatives, to reduce and whiten spots - Sun-block X Whitening X Coloring, to create a natural nude makeup within three minutes - To comprehensively obstruct and absorb “UVA l” the main culprit of photo-aging Beauty Tips! We can choose the product that makes our skin feel more comfortable, depending on the season and our skin texture. The conversion of the duration for sun-block effect can be calculated according to SPF Factor. 1. Indoor, cloudy day SPF15-30 PA+; Apply it once, before going out 2. Outdoor, general going-out - SPF30-45 PA++; Apply it before going out and make a 3. Outdoor activity over a long period of time; at the seaside or on the snow land - SPF 45- 50 PA+++; Make a supplement in every 1~2 hours Many more layers of sun-block will not necessarily result in better effect. No matter how many sun-block products you have applied, the maximum sun-block effect will show in accordance with the highest factor. In fact, the sun-block will be useful once you have applied it. As the types of sun-block agents have been improved, the application of a sun-block product can adhere to skin quickly to exert its function. However, for people who tend to sweat easily, it is recommended that they apply sun-block 15 minutes before going out, for fear of the loss of sun-block due to sweat that fails to achieve sun-block effect.

Acid DNA Repairing Series” that deeply hydrates the skin while combating against skin aging.

While studying clinical cases, Neogence’s R&D team discovered that as skin lacks moisture, it becomes dry, rough and desquamating, furthermore, once skin has long-term shortage of moisture, it will easily evoked initial stage of aging by environmental pollution, and advance the appearance of aging, including fine lines, dullness, enlarged pores and decreasing elasticity.

The “HYALURONIC ACID DNA REPAIRING SERIES”, aims at skin dryness, environmental factor, life habits, and various causes that could trigger skin aging, it comprehensively and further upgrades the way of moisturizing & anti-aging. (HYALURONIC FILLING SPHERE), wrinkle smoothing peptide MATRIXYLTM3000, eye contour brightening factor BIOPHYTEX®, reaching the effectiveness of “Hydration X Elasticity increasing X Anti-Aging” at the same time, activating and moisturizing the
skin from within to fight against aging.

name: ace renewal & repairing mask
ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Ceteareth-20, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Ceteareth-12, Cetyl Palmitate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Polysorbate 20, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Methylparaben , Retinol, Pentylene Glycol, Lecithin, Alcohol, Ascorbyl Palm
description:
Relieve your heavy skin--ACE Revitalizing and Brightening Series

All-Round Skin Revitalizing System – for Skin Renewal, Brightening, Protection and Anti-Oxidant

Clinical studies have found that oily skin has poor absorption issue

Neogence clinical trials proved that, oily and combination skins do not obviously reveal signs of aging such as roughness , dullness, dark spots, loss of skin firmness, yet, at the same time, this particular type of skin is having poor essence absorption in skincare products, this creates a vicious cycle for other skin problems for them.
Because of the slow metabolism for this skin type, making the structure of epidermal cells irregular and disorganized and in return the excess sebum secretion make the old and dead skin cells stick up on the skin surface, leading to the poor absorption ability. If no remedial action is taken, even thousands bottles of precious skincare products are being used, the result of anti-aging protection would be limited.

Relieve your heavy skin! -- ACE Revitalizing and Brightening Series
Neogence ACE Revitalizing and Brightening Series is a skincare product line developed and designed for combination and oily skins. Target to “Restructure and Renew the heave Skin”, Neogence has applied “Patent Biochemical Conduction Technology”in the series to further enhance the quality of this series. Clinical tests proved that the skin absorption is 300% increased after using the ACE products, allowing the active ingredients penetrate into your skin effectively and easily.  deepest layer of the epidermis to do so, effectively increasing absorption of ingredients by 300%!

Strategy 2. Vitamin A works on the deep, underlying layers of skin to renew, restructure, and metabolize old skin cells, improving absorption

All-Round formula- Renewal x Brightening x Anti-Oxidant
With help of Vitamin A, C, and E in skin renewing, lightening, and anti-oxidant, plus another two patent ingredients, Biophytex (eye contour brightening factor) and Matrixyl™3000 (fine lines smoothing factor), ACE series effectively release skin from dullness and roughness, darkness and restore skin firmness. Biomedical Conduct Technology—Rovisome® ACE Plus Effect Diagram

ACE RENEWAL & REPAIRING MASK

  • Vitamin A+C+E microemulsion essence, 15minutes of intensive repairing.
  • Peptide wrinkle-smoothing factor Matrixyl™3000 effectively reduce wrinkles
  • Vitamin A renews skin, refines pores, and increases elasticity
  • Superconducting fiber material applies flawlessly to skin, allowing complete absorption of the essences.

description: Brings back clarity, radiance and smoothness back to the skin. Non-irritating peeling gel that is gentle and refreshing with visible exfoliating results. It contains Merdel Complex that not only sooth but also hydrate and nourish the skin effectively by removing dead skin cells & controlling melanin pigmentation.     Merdel Complex contains of Deep Sea Water and 11 Deep Sea Minerals to purify, hydrate and firm skin as well as ability to immediate sooth skin irritations (e.g. redness, itchiness...). Unexpected skin allergies will occur even in the 30-40s, as such it is important to purify, maintain & improve skin protection against these internal or external stresses.     Skin turn-over cycle slows down as we age or even basing on our diet habit, if we do not remove the dead skin cells, new and healthier skin cells are unable to surface and this results in dull looking skin as well as uneven skin tone.    Directions:    Typical usage Per Week basing on your Skin Type-  Acne: 1 time, minimize massage strength.  Aging (Ageing):   2 times.  Combination: 2 times, concentrating more on T and U-zone area.  Dry: 1 time.  Normal: 1-2 times.  Oily: 2-3 times.  Sensitive (Sensitized): 1 time, minimize massage strength and sensitive areas.     After cleansing and drying, evenly apply an adequate amount to face avoiding the eye and mouth areas. In a circular upwards motion, massage into skin then rinse off with water (preferably warm water). Take caution to avoid getting product in eyes. Following with OSSION Mild Touch Soothing Overnight Pack or usual skin care routine especially Toner (Fluid).     Minimize strength of massage on sensitive areas (e.g. open pimple wounds).

description:
Chemical interference can damage hair. In permed hair the cystine-disulphide bond is split. At the end, when the hair has been re-formed the bond is closed again, but there is a permanent change in the keratin composition. Dyeing hair blond is based on an oxidizing destruction of the natural color pigments. Usually synthetic substances are used to color and depending on the formula they penetrate deeper into the hair and combine with the keratin. If hair isn’t looked after carefully it will dry out, look dull and lifeless and can break and split.

 

Avocado COLOR-PROTECTING SHAMPOO
Chemically treated hair is extremely sensitive and needs special care. The ultra-mild tenside combination guarantees gentle cleansing. Cold-pressed avocado oil and natural horsetail extract are natural regenerative substances that give elasticity. The high quality combination of herbal active ingredients protects and enhances the color brilliance.
 

Avocado COLOR-PROTECTING HAIR TREATMENT
This rich intensive care with pure cold-pressed avocado oil and horsetail extract conditions the scalp and regulates the moisture balance. Chemically treated hair is especially sensitive when it is wet and should never be pulled. The RAUSCH Avocado COLOR-PROTECTING HAIR TREATMENT immediately detangles, giving the hair new vitality and strengthening it to the tips. If the scalp is oily, work into hair tips and along the hair.

  • Avocado oil (Persea gratissima oil): is rich in unsaturated fatty acids – gives the hair elasticity and protects the color
  • Horsetail extract (Equisetum arvense leaf extract): is rich in silicic acid – strengthens the scalp and hair

description:
Dry and brittle hair easily appears straw-like and dull. This is due to a hypofunction of the sebaceous glands where not enough sebum reaches the scalp to supply the hair with an adequate protective layer of lipids. There is a lack of protective, conditioning oily corpuscles, which keep the hair smooth, supple and glossy. The causes for this appearance could be the use of too strong oil-removing products, sun, wind, too hot hair-dryer, hormonal fluctuations, an unbalanced diet or even a low fat diet. This type of hair is often found in people with naturally curly hair.

 

Egg Oil SHINE SHAMPOO
This mild conditioning shampoo has a tenside base of coconut oil, enriched with valuable lecithin from natural egg yolks, purest glycerine and selected vegetable oils. It gives dry and brittle hair new strength, elasticity and natural shine. Natural proteins tangibly protect the scalp; the hair becomes more resistant, it falls more softly and has a natural lustre.

  • Pure egg yolk (Ovum): rich in proteins – strengthens the hair
  • Wheat germ extract (Triticum vulgare germ extract): high protein content and vitamin E – strengthens and protects the hair structure

 

Horsetail NOURISHING SCALP AND HAIR PACK
This rich intensive care treatment with 20% pure natural horsetail extract and valuable vegetable oils regenerates dry and brittle hair by restoring lost moisture. It strengthens the scalp and hair, giving it elasticity and natural shine. If the scalp is extremely dry or stressed, leave the conditioner in during a sauna or overnight to allow it to penetrate. It is also very successful in treating psoriasis.

  • Horsetail extract (Equisetum arvense leaf extract): is rich in silicic acid – improves the physiology of the scalp, strengthens the structure of the hair
  • Sunflower seed oil (Helianthus annuus seed oil): cold-pressed, rich in unsaturated fatty acids – makes the hair smoother
  • Lanolin: ultra-pure natural wool fat (Adeps lanae) – coats every hair with conditioning lipids

description:
Heartseed Sensitive Shampoo
Cleanses especially gently, calms highly-sensitive scalps, effectively relieves itchiness and gives fullness and shine.

With Cardiospermum.  More and more people suffer from irritated scalps and thin, lifeless hair. The Swiss hair specialists RAUSCH AG KREUZLINGEN have met this widespread problem with a mild, innovative range of products: a natural-source, hypo-allergenic, soothing shampoo and a carefully coordinated balm. 

Especially developed for the needs of highly-sensitive, irritated or allergy-stressed scalps. This new range of products is based on valuable natural active ingredients. Heartseed (Cardiospermum halicacabum L.), which gives the product its name, is an extremely effective extract which forms an ideal, mild base. Heartseed‘s best-tolerated active ingredients are the ideal solution for allergy sufferers. The balloon-shaped fruit of this exotic vine typically contains three small seeds which are dark brown, with a white, heart-shaped marking. 

The shampoo is absolutely free from preservatives, fragrances and dyestuffs, contain neither silicones, sulphates, mineral oils nor PEG. Its optimal tolerability has been clinically tested and dermatologically confirmed. Thanks to the excellent combination of compatible active ingredients, it is also ideally suited for children with highly-sensitive scalps.

 

Heartseed Sensitive Balm
Ensures an ideally balanced scalp, strengthens the skin‘s own protective barrier and effectively relieves irritation, soothes and moisturized. With Cardiospermum 

More and more people suffer from irritated scalps and thin, lifeless hair. The Swiss hair specialists RAUSCH AG KREUZLINGEN have met this widespread problem with a mild, innovative range of products: a natural-source, hypo-allergenic, soothing shampoo and a carefully coordinated balm. 

The balm is absolutely free from preservatives, fragrances and dyestuffs, contain neither silicones, sulphates, mineral oils nor PEG. Its optimal tolerability has been clinically tested and dermatologically confirmed. Thanks to the excellent combination of compatible active ingredients, it is also ideally suited for children with highly-sensitive scalps.

 

Heartseed: the little benefactor with the big impact Heartseed is a common remedy in homeopathy for strengthening, conditioning and healing highly-sensitive, irritated skin. Its positive characteristics are rooted in the folk medicine of many tribes of tropical and/or sub-tropical Africa and America, where heartseed has long been used to soothe and heal rashes and skin irritations.

name: sebamed shower oil
ingredients: Avocado oil (Persea Gratissima), Lecithin, MIPA-Laureth Sulfate, Laureth-4, Mineral Oil(Paraffinum Liquidum), Poloxamer 101, Cocamide DEA, Fragrance (Parfum), Sodium Lactate
description:
Normally dry skin is also sensitive.  Dryness can range from mild to severe, which can affect any part of the body.  The most common symptom is itching, which can be mildly annoying to severely intense, often disturbing sleep. 


Sensitive skin is commonly dry and prone to allergic reactions but sensitive skin is not the same as allergic skin.  Sensitive skin may react to the product only in the area of application while allergic skin reacts with the whole body. 


Sensitive skin has fewer defense mechanisms to deal with stress factors, making it more fragile and vulnerable to irritation, roughness and extreme dryness.

The following factors can render skin drying out and sensitive skin:

  • Allergy
  • Aggressive skin cleansing
  • Climatic factors, pollution
  • Air-conditioning, artificial lighting (eg: laser, infra-red & etc)
  • Incorrect diet On medication (eg: diabetic, high cholesterol, contraceptive pill, etc)
  • Menopause or post menopause
  • Psychological factors (eg: stress)
  • Occupational hazard (eg: excessive exposure to water, solvent & etc)

Sebamed Shower Oil is the cleanser of choice for those experiencing the above

  • 100% soap free & alkali free
  • with pH5.5, the natural pH of healthy skin
  • Over 50% lipids keep the skin smooth & supple
  • Gentle fine porous foam
  • Regenerates and lubricates the skin, making it silky soft and smooth to touch
  • Prevents further moisture loss and irritation during showering
  • Oil penetrate: rapidly leaving no greasy residue

For natural and gentle cleansing of the external genital area and therapy supportive intimate hygiene,  Sebamed Feminine Wash has been especially formulated with a mild naturally based wash active complex and adjusted to the pH value of 3.8 of the genital acid mantle with skin-related lactic acid. 

 

The acidic balance of the pH value 3.8 in this sensitive area is essential prophylactic protection against bacterial and fungal infections.  The pH value of 3.8 is nature’s protection during the child-bearing years.   

 

Aloe barbadensis activates the skin’s moisture balance.  The soothing antibacterial property of alpha bisabolol cares for this sensitive skin.  A reassuring, pleasant fragrance for your personal comfort, especially during the menstrual cycle.   

 

The mildness of the wash active substance is another important factor in protecting the sensitive genital area against the irritation of dryness.  Sebamed Feminine Intimate Wash has been specifically formulated for effective hygiene to protect the health of your skin.

 

Efficiancy/ Tolerance
In the initial phase of product development, a panel of 80 female gynaecologists tested Feminine Intimate Wash personally to determine the efficacy and skin tolerability of the product giving high notes for the tolerance.

The panel members also found the product had noticeable soothing and analgetic properties.

  • 94% of the doctors described the wash as “Pleasant to use”
  • 94% stated that the wash gave them “a feeling of Well-being”
  • 97% described it as “Gentle” and
  • 84% said it gave them “a feeling of immediate Freshness”

ingredients: Thanakha- Cools & Moisturizes hair, Yoghurt-  Deeply nourishes & coats hair surface without damaging hair structure, thus providing soft & shiny hair, Honey- Provides intense nourishments which provides great  results in locking the color for a lasting effect & perfect coverage, giving healthier, long lasting color brilliance hair, Green Tea- Enriched with sunscreen properties and protect from harmful UV rays

description:
3x More Moisturized & Lasting Fragrance 


Ginvera has just introduced Silky Shine, a new hair care series that is tailored to provide a more thorough cleansing and protect hair from sun damage, free radicals, chemicals and daily hair styling.

 

Enriched with Thanakha, Biotin and various nature’s nourishing ingredients, Silky Shine also aims to nourish hair that is short of nutrients stripped off from "chemical overdose" from certain hair products.

 

Available in four variants, Silky Shine Shampoo & Conditioner caters to various hair needs and is formulated with active ingredients which provide three times more moisture and protection, leaving hair soft, shiny and longer lasting fragrance.

 

For silky soft and smooth hair, the Silky Shine Straight and Smooth range targets long, frizzy and dry hair. Uniquely formulated with Thanakha extract and blended with Biotin, it enables active ingredients such as Olive Oil, Pomelo and Green Tea to penetrate deeply, seal moisture and nourish hair.

 

Always had dull-looking hair? The Silky Shine Clean and Soft range is suitable for daily cleansing, creating a livelier look. Ingredients penetrate effectively, seal nourishment and moisture hair follicles, leaving hair soft, lively and manageable. This range is enriched with peppermint (deep cleansing of scalp), Ginseng (clears away oil congestion) and Green Tea (natural UV protection).

 

Also suitable for coloured hair, the Silky Shine Repair and Colour Protect range prevents hair from drying, brittle while maintaining colour vibrancy.

 

If you have concerns for scalp care, the Silky Shine Scalp Care and Dandruff Control range leaves you with "no more" itchy scalp and dandruff.

name: time essence serum
ingredients: Liquorice Root,Chamomilla,Ubiquinone,Astaxanthin,Jojoba Seed Oil,
description:
“8 of 10 TES Users noticed brighter, more supple skin within 7 sessions*”

Time Essence Serum (TES) features encapsulated technology from
Japan. This allows our freshest active ingredients to reach your skin in its purest form.
This revolutionary capsule is engineering by harvesting pectin from botanical extracts,
much like the protective layer around fresh fruits, to prevent oxidization and
deterioration of the serum compound within.

To activate ingredients within the Time Essence Serum Capsule, just select a few
capsules and crush them before application. Use as often as required, but for best
results, as part of SkinPerfect’s SkinSaver Solution.

Bigger Capsules. More Essence.
In the case of TES, size does matter. Our larger than average capsule size allow much
more active ingredients to reach your skin, optimizing every application. TES contains
33 ingredients, some of which are:

Jojoba Seed Oil: Natural Moisturiser
Retards water loss to enhance skin flexibility and suppleness. Jojoba is completely
miscible with the natural sebum of the skin, and when used on the skin forms a very thin,
non-greasy lipoid layer. This layer is partially porous and provides exceptional trans-
epidermal respiration and moisture control.

Astaxanthin: Powerful Anti-Oxidant
Produced by algae in a specific response to combat UV-induced oxidative stress.
Astaxanthin has been shown to protect cells in vivo by reducing visible signs UV-aging
through both topical and dietary supplementation within 4 to 6 weeks of use. As part of
TES, it has an overall natural brightening effect on skin.

Ubiquinone: Anti-Wrinkle
Coenzyme Q10 (Ubiquinone) is a natural cell booster – it activates the production of
energy in cells, to revitalize cellular functions. This enhances the absorption of other
skincare products. Q10 slows down the visible signs of aging, for more youthful skin.

Chamomilla: Skin Soother
Chamomile has an antiseptic and healing quality, which is effective in relieving skin
congestion. TES softens the skin with its carminative and healing effect along with its
natural antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties. Azulene, is also added which helps
to reduce puffiness and cleanse pore impurities.

Liquorice Root: Skin Tightening
Liquorice Root has an anti-inflammatory effect and calms sensitivity, roughness and
skin irritation caused by allergies, inflamed pimples and sunburn.

All these ingredients work in perfect synergy to aid in your skin’s recovery towards
naturally perfect skin. Time Essence Serum is non-greasy and allows make-up to glide
on effortlessly.


SkinPerfect’s Promise to Your Skin
SkinPerfect’s quality botanical ingredients and advanced skin analysis system, featuring
medical-grade Visia, allows unparalleled accuracy to diagnose skin problems, rendering
the highest efficacy in our treatments. You’ll notice results in just 20 minutes.
What has you skin care regiment done for you lately?

About SkinPerfect
SkinPerfect shares upon the knowledge and expertise of the well-known weight-
management chain, BodyPerfect, to bring the most effective, result-oriented solutions
for the growing needs of Asian skin.

Enjoy skin that looks luminous from within, with Moisture White Shiso, skincare collection from The Body Shop, designed to target freckles and brown spots as well as brighten, boosting skin confidence.


The Moisture White skin care collection provides women wanting clearer-looking skin, a more uniform skin tone and translucent complexion, with a full regime from start to finish— from a cleansing powder, essence, serum to moisture milk, night treatment, targeted care for stubborn spots and sun protection.

 

These specialist skincare products contain shiso, and are designed to help improve the appearance of dark spots and discolouration, even before hyperpigmentation begins.

Products in the Moisture WhiteTM Shiso range also contain Vitamin C and liquorice.

  • Vitamin C is believed to provide anti-oxidant protection, helping to reduce melanin production.
  • Liquorice, extracted from the root of the Glycyrrhiza Glabra plant, has a reputation for helping address hyperpigmentation.

For its soothing and hydrating properties, The Body Shop has included Community Fair Trade organic aloe vera in the Moisture White range too.


Moisture White Shiso Whitening Serum
Enjoy whitening action for up to 12 hours, address the production of excessive melanin and even-out your skin tone with this serum. Blend gently onto your skin for an invisible and non-sticky treatment that helps skin look translucent and skin feel soft and supple, hydrating for up to 12 hours. This Shiso Whitening Serum is proven to reduce the visibility of brown spots and freckles, by users in Japan.

 

Moisture White Skincare Regime
Enhance your skin confidence with the Moisture White collection, for a daily whitening and moisturising regime.

ingredients: Polyhexamethylene biguanide hydrochloride (PHMB)  Chlorhexidine Digluconate,  Deionised Water, Perfume
description:
Zappy boy Antiseptic Wipes kill germs convienently without water!

GENERAL DESCRIPTION

Zappy BoyTM Antiseptic Wipes contains blend of antiseptic agents to work synergistically to give a faster
and broader germs reduction efficacy. Zappy BoyTM is alcohol-free and has no rinse application for quick
cleaning. It is safer and gentler to skin even for every day use.

WHEN TO USE IT

  • For minor cuts and grazes, burn and scalds
  • For insect bites and stings
  • For hand cleaning before and after meals
  • Used as daily skin sanitizer
  • For hand and body disinfection where washing would be inadequate and impractical
  • After sweaty sports
  • After playing with pets
  • Travelling


METHOD OF APPLICATION

Gently wipe the towel on the area needed to be sanitized.

PRECAUTIONS

This is for external use. Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membrane. If solution comes in contact with
the eyes, wash out promptly and thoroughly with water.

USABLE LIFE AND STORAGE

This product has a usable life of 2 years from the date of production.Store in a cool dry place not over 30 degrees.
